mapper.select:
select count(1) from
select #{item.id} as id, #{item.unitCode} as unitCode, #{item.unitName} as unitName, #{item.countYear} as countYear, #{item.countQuarter} as countQuarter, #{item.mobileNumber} as mobileNumber, #{item.exceedWater} as exceedWater, #{item.increaseMoney} as increaseMoney, #{item.receiverName} as receiverName
t1 left join ( select id, business_id from t_sms_info as a where message_type=#{json.messageTypecode} ) as t2 on t2.business_id=t1.id left join( select sms_id, unit_code, phone_number, status from t_sms_sendInfo ) as t3 on t3.sms_id =t2.id and t3.unit_code=t1.unitCode and t3.phone_number=t1.mobileNumber where 1=1
and 1=1
and status is null or status =''
and status=#{json.status}
;
